messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Library.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a horde of wire eating mammals have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a number of mice have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Construction Area.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Telecomms Control Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a number of energy draining parasites have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Maintenance.
